root: ^Another beautiful, sunny morning in the Flatrock School for Demons, Devils, and Infernals. Guess I better get used to this if I'm gonna be sticking around.

s: ^I should head to the Crow's Nest to see the Headmaster
^I'd rather explore the Hayloft, get to know my peers

loft: ^You leave your room to get some breakfast with your new friends.
nest: ^You leave you room to see what the Headmaster will have you do.
